alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 9:27AM CST until February 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale For the Little River...including Rivervale...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale. * WHEN...From late Friday night to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Farm land north of Rivervale is flooded. Low-lying portions of Highway 158 near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 11.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
